entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 30%
